SEARCH
Package com.example.slices.controllers

Class DBConnector

java.lang.Object
com.example.slices.controllers.DBConnector
public class DBConnector extends Object
This class is used to interact with the Firebase Firestore database. It provides methods for getting, writing, and deleting data from the database.
